## 规则

[[grid]]
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **用途**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| | 开关 (Switch) 组件允许用户打开或关闭某个状态。
|
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **区别**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |与[切换](/pattern/Toggle?styleguide-components-enabled=true&react--core-components-enabled=true&core-components-enabled=true&appearance-enabled=true)不同，开关用于打开和关闭某个状态。
|
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **颜色配方**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |  `colorRecipe450`
